title: Tomato Sandwich with Zucchini Butter
description: Building a remarkable tomato sandwich is an exercise in patience. You have to wait for the right time, when the tomatoes are peak. This is my first of the year topped with mayo, zucchini butter, avocado, and fresh basil. Continue reading Tomato Sandwich with Zucchini Butter on 101 Cookbooks
author: Heidi Swanson
